name: Night Shift (itch) (MR.PERGERSON)
description:
Your name is Diego. You're an independent contractor hired by San Francisco Dynamic Security, a company developing security robots on the verge of bankruptcy. During a terrible thunder storm, the power has gone off and the robots have gone haywire! You are tasked with turning on the backup generators with nothing to protect you but your trusty flashlight. Thankfully, shining your light seems to stun the robots! Using your agility and quick wits, return power to the facility and get the lights on before the robots get you and the company goes under! WASD/Arrow Keys - Move P/Esc - Pause
